mapper.select: SELECT re.review_id,rating,nick_name,review_date,goods_name, title,content,photo1,photo2,photo3,photo4,photo5, count(li.review_id) AS count FROM review AS re JOIN tb_newbee_mall_order_item as item ON re.goods_id=item.goods_id AND re.order_id=item.order_id LEFT JOIN review_like AS li ON re.review_id=li.review_id WHERE item.goods_id=#{goodsId} AND proved=0 AND rating=#{rating} GROUP BY re.review_id ORDER BY rating DESC,count DESC LIMIT #{start},#{number}

SELECT item.order_id,item.goods_id,user_id FROM tb_newbee_mall_order_item AS item LEFT JOIN review AS re ON re.order_id = item.order_id AND re.goods_id= item.goods_id JOIN tb_newbee_mall_order AS o ON item.order_id=o.order_id WHERE item.goods_id=#{goodsId} AND re.order_id IS NULL AND user_id=#{userId} ORDER BY o.create_time
SELECT AVG(rating) AS rating_avg,COUNT(*) AS review_count, COUNT(title) AS title_count FROM review WHERE proved=0 AND goods_id=#{goodsId};
